Urban Spectacles

Posted to Mottr.am by
Jack
on 25 June 2009. Tags: design specs

Bespoke, hand-made frames carved from a single block of wood, by Urban Spectacles. I bet they feel absolutely wonderful on the ears. Via mathowie's del.icio.us.
